params.tagline: A Blog like by nature lovers.
params.about_text: I am the master of HTML, FLASK and JavaScript. I know everything needed to make a website function efficiently. I didn't stop with the web. I went beyond with the most popular Python framework called django. I even know the deployment, server and security. I will give you 100% web solution.copyright MD imtiazul islam shuvo 2021, a Blind programmer.
